I want to talk to a human

responses: Please wait. A customer service agent will be in contact with you shortly
Hello

Hi

Fin-AI offers financial services including the calculation of house prices on behalf of customers and assessment of their eligibility for loans.
Happy to help!
Any time!
My pleasure

patterns: What time does the office close
What are the office hours in your location
What time are you open till
responses: Fin-AI offices are open Monday to Friday from 9am to 6pm. We are closed Saturday and Sunday

patterns: do you have any offices near
do you have an office by
What other offices are you by
responses: Our main office is at CIT, Rossa Avenue, Cork. We also have offices in Dublin and Galway.
I can help you with registration, login, the loan eligibility calculator and the house price quotation calculator
What kind of problem are you having?

patterns: I would like to apply for a loan
how can I apply for a loan
am I eligible for a loan
responses: Please use the loan eligibility calculator to assess your eligibility for a loan

patterns: I would like to determine the price I should pay for a house
What price do you recommend for a house
what should I pay for this house
responses: Please use the house price calculator to determine the recommended price for the house you are interested in

patterns: I am having problems logging in
responses: Please make sure you have entered a valid email address
If you have forgotten your password click on 'Forgotten Password?'
If you do not already have an account you need to register
Please make sure you have entered a valid email address
Your password must be at least eight characters long
Please ensure you have entered the same password in the 'Confirm password' text box

patterns: I can't find my client in the database
responses: Please ensure that you have entered the correct name and client ID
Please ensure that you have entered your client's name correctly
Please ensure that you have entered your client's ID correctly

patterns: the calculator will not give me a recommended price
the house price calculator will not give me an estimate
the house calculator will not give me a quotation
responses: Please make sure you have entered a value in all of the fields
Please click on the 'calculate' button to obtain a recommendation

patterns: what should I put in for the asking price
responses: The asking price is the amount for which the house is being sold
Please enter the amount for which the house is being sold

patterns: what is the bedrooms field looking for
what should I put in for the bedrooms
what should I enter for bedrooms
responses: Please enter the number of bedrooms in the house being sold

patterns: what should I put in for the number of bathrooms
how should I fill in number of bathrooms
what is the number of bathrooms
responses: Enter the number of bathrooms where 0.5 accounts for a room with a toilet but no shower

patterns: what is the sq ft living space
what should I put in for the sq ft living space
what should I enter for square foot living space
responses: Please enter the square footage of the dwelling's interior living space

patterns: what is the sq ft lot
what should I put in for the sq ft land space
what should I enter for square foot land space
responses: Please enter the square footage of the land space

patterns: what is the number of floors
what should I put in for the number of floors
responses: Please enter the number of floors

patterns: what should I put in for waterfront property
responses: Select 'Yes' if the dwelling is overlooking the waterfront

patterns: what should I put in for the view
what should I enter for view
responses: Please select from the dropdown menu a rating of the view ranging from 0 to 4

patterns: what is the condition looking for
what should I put in for the condition
responses: 'Condition' refers to the condition of the dwelling being sold. Please select from the dropdown menu a rating from 1 to 5

patterns: what should I put in for the grade
responses: Please select from the dropdown menu a value from 1 to 13, where 1-3 falls short of building construction and design, 7 has an average level of construction and design, and 11-13 have a high quality level of construction and design

patterns: what is the sq ft above
what should I put in for the square foot above
what should I enter for sqft above
responses: Please enter the square footage of the interior housing space that is above ground level

patterns: what is the sq ft basement
what should I put in for the square foot basement
what should I enter for sqft basement
responses: Please enter the square footage of the interior housing space that is below ground level

patterns: what should I put in for the year built
what should I enter for year built
responses: Please enter the year the house was initially built

patterns: what should I put in for the year renovated
what should I enter for year renovated
responses: Please enter the year of the house's last renovation

patterns: what should I put in for the zipcode
what should I enter for zipcode
responses: Please enter the zipcode in which the house is located

patterns: what should I put in for the latitude of the house
what should I enter for latitude
responses: Please enter the latitude at which the house is located. Latitude is a measurement on a globe or map of location north or south of the Equator.

patterns: what should I put in for the longitude of the house
what should I enter for longitude
responses: Please enter the longitude at which the house is located. Longitude is a measurement of location east or west of the prime meridian at Greenwich, the specially designated imaginary north-south line that passes through both geographic poles and Greenwich, London.

patterns: the calculator will not give me a recommendation for loan eligibility
the loan eligibility calculator will not give me recommendation
the loan calculator will not give me a recommendation
responses: Please make sure you have entered a value in all of the fields
Please click on the 'calculate' button to obtain a recommendation

patterns: what should I select for marital status
should I select married or not married
responses: If you are married please select the option 'Married'. If you are single, separated or divorced please select 'Not Married'

patterns: what should I choose for gender
should I choose male or female
I am neither male nor female
responses: In future we hope to provide options for transgender and nonbinary gender identities but for the moment please select your sex as declared on your birth certificate.

patterns: what should I select for graduate
I graduated from high school so which option should I select
what should I select for education
responses: If you have graduated from a third-level university or college select the option 'Graduate', otherwise select 'Not Graduated'

patterns: what should I put in for the number of dependents
responses: A dependent is a person who is supported financially by the borrower. This may include your children and your spouse.

patterns: what should I select for employment
what if I work for myself
responses: If you have been working for yourself for the previous year select 'Yes'

patterns: what should I put in for applicant income
what should I enter for coapplicant income
responses: Please enter your income for the previous tax year
Please enter the amount of money you want to borrow

patterns: what should I put in for the term
what should I enter for the term
responses: Please enter the length of time over which you would like to repay the loan

patterns: what should I select for the property area
what should I choose for the property area
responses: Please select from the three options where the property is located. Is it in a urban, semiurban or rural area.

patterns: I want to search financial data
responses: Please search by client name or ID in the database
